title: Twitterâ€™s new Circle feature lets you limit your tweets to a select audience
content:
In July last year, Twitter shared gave us a sneak peek at an in-development feature called Trusted Friends that aimed to give users greater control over who can see and react to their tweets. After spending nearly a year in development, the feature is finally going live, albeit with a new name: Twitter Circle. Twitter

The post Twitter’s new Circle feature lets you limit your tweets to a select audience appeared first on XDA.
description: Twitter Circle allows users to limit the reach and visibility of their tweets to a small group of close friends./
